titleStmt.title: Foure learned and godly treatises viz. The carnall hypocrite. The churches deliverances. The deceitfulnesse of sinne. The benefit of afflictions. By T.H.
titleStmt.author: Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Tho. Cotes, for Andrew Crooke, and are to be sold at the signe of the Beare in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: On 2 Tim. iii.5, Judg. x.13, Ps. cxix.29, and Prov. i.28-9.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Beare in Pauls Churchyard
